2055310.name: Hidden Champion
2055310.description:
Welcome to Hidden Champion – Your Chance to Conquer the Global Economy!

Build your own company, forge valuable business relationships, and develop smart strategies to become a market leader. Your goal: capture 90% of the global market share and maintain it for one month. Do you have what it takes to become a Hidden Champion? Then let’s get started!

Your First Step to Success

Choose your character and decide which city will be the starting point of your business journey. From here, you’ll expand, make strategic decisions, and position your company in the global market. Keep an eye on the world map—it will help you spot opportunities and plan your next moves!

How to Play Hidden Champion

  • Secure Contracts: Travel to different cities, negotiate skillfully, and win valuable deals. Use your business acumen to gain new partners!

  • Optimize Your Supply Chain: Select the best transport method for your goods. Will you go for express shipping or plan efficiently with a cost-effective route?

  • Boost Your Brand Awareness: If contracts are scarce, launch targeted marketing campaigns to increase your visibility. Choose local advertising or digital strategies to expand your reach!

  • Expand Your Business: Construct new locations in cities where you or one of your construction managers is present. Strengthen your presence and grow your company!

  • Build a Strong Team: Hire employees, assign them to the right departments, and ensure smooth operations to maximize efficiency.

Your Success is in Your Hands

Follow strategic goals and tips to steadily grow your business. But be careful—missed contracts go to competitors, reducing your market share. Stay sharp, act wisely, and secure the best deals!

Winning the Game

If you manage to capture 90% of the market share and maintain it for one month, you’ve proven yourself as a true Hidden Champion. Showcase your strategic skills and build your company into a global market leader!

Are you ready for the challenge? Then jump in now and become the Hidden Champion!
